column5: Had 4 hrs caught 4 Bass & 2 pike On Flip'n Jigs Nothing big but we were happy, Randy's was on a Tube Jig under that dock  Frogs caught one also & missed a few slow bite, not a bad way to kill time while Randy's truck was getting tires & ball joints  Off to Grey County KVD Spinnerbait's were working for both Smallies & Largies  Then came the Buzzbait & Spook fish'n gotta love it  We caught about 20 Bass on spinnerbait's from 1:30 til 7:30, then switched over & caught another 15 or 20 on Buzzbaits & Sara Spooks headed home about 9:30 what a great night biggest 8 would have been 16.5" to 17.5" & a bunch between 10" & 13", I need to go back there soon, working nights all weekend though, hopefully I can go Monday afternoon Richard
Awesome Richard You guys did great Thanks for sharing Leechman
What a bass factory! Gotta love the evening topwater bite! Thanks for sharing!
If i ever start bass fishing ....im going to follow you around ...  nice shootin
Maybe we should trade a day's fishing with each other lol Richard
richard's your name.  bass fishing is you GAME!
Some nice Bass there and close to home to boot!
